Text: There is some weird anti-spam or something blocking the posting of this comment, just read this at http://www.pastebay.net/314620 before asking any questions. Thanks, and have fun.

Be sure to delete everything in the save folder if you're starting a new game..
(Or else you'll have an extra 9 "deaths/losses" in your game record/history.)
